answers.answer: Various organizations offer mental health consultations, psychological support, specialized psychological and psychiatric support, MHPSS capacity building, and workshops for refugees.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: One can sign up for ALIAT Association workshops by contacting the team via email at inside@aliatong.ro.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees and read the section under 'Mental health services for refugees from Ukraine ALIAT Association'.

answers.answer: ALIAT Association workshops take place every Wednesday at the Aliat Clinic and Fridays at the Sante Clinic.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees and read the section under 'Mental health services for refugees from Ukraine ALIAT Association'.

answers.answer: Atelier Psy Clinic provides specialized services including psychology, psychiatry, adult psychiatry, pediatric psychiatry, and addiction treatment.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees and read the section under 'Atelier Psy Clinic'.

answers.answer: Atelier Psy Clinic services can be settled through the insurance company (CNAS).
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees and read the section under 'Atelier Psy Clinic'.

answers.answer: Red Cross Romania supports consultations and psychological support in Russian, Ukrainian, Romanian, and English.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees and read the section under 'Psychological support in Bucharest Red Cross Romania'.

answers.answer: Hias organizes MHPSS capacity building events for humanitarian workers, including trainings, seminars, webinars, and supervision.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees and read the section under 'Hias'.

answers.answer: Project HOPE provides a variety of psychological assistance for all those in need.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees and read the section under 'Project HOPE'.

answers.answer: IOM provides psychological support by referencing vulnerable individuals to resources, organizing psychosocial support and mental health awareness events, mental health first aid, and offering training, workshops, and supervision.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees and read the section under 'The International Organization for Migration (IOM)'.

answers.answer: Terre des hommes Foundation offers psychological assistance to refugees from Ukraine, third-country nationals, local Romanian population, pregnant/nursing women, children, LGBTIQ+, Roma community, and unaccompanied children.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees and read the section under 'Terre des hommes Foundation'.

answers.answer: Terre des hommes Foundation provides assistance by referring individuals/families to resources, offering community-based and targeted psychosocial support, specialized HCWSP services, mental health awareness, psychological first aid (PFA), and capacity building for humanitarian workers.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees and read the section under 'Terre des hommes Foundation'.

answers.answer: Contre la Faim offers psychological support including referral to specialists, community-based and targeted psychosocial support, mental health awareness, psychological first aid (PFA), and MHPSS capacity building for humanitarian and aid workers.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees and read the section under 'The Contre la Faim organization'.

answers.answer: Médecins du monde (France) provides mental health services for refugees from Ukraine and other categories of people.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees and read the section under 'Organization Médecins du monde (France)'.

answers.answer: The AMURTEL team offers various workshops and MHPSS support in individual or group sessions.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees and read the section under 'The AMURTEL team'.

answers.answer: One can find psychological support in other cities by selecting the desired city under the “Other cities“ item in the main menu, where all necessary information and advice in multiple languages are available.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/psychological-support-for-ukrainian-refugees and read the section under 'Psychological support in other cities of Romania'.
